review_text:
WWE 2K16 is clearly the best WWE 2K game on PC. 
Next to WWE 2K14 (which is really one of the best WWE Wrestlinggames ever) the best WWE 2K game to date. 
Of course it's not WWE HCTP (the GOAT / the best WWE game ever), but I have to say it's really the best WWE / wrestling game for the PC to date. 

Unfortunately, the successors (WWE 2K17-2K20) have hardly any innovations, and even have a lot more bugs and glitches, which is one of many reasons why I prefer WWE 2K16.
Besides that this game has the best (legend) roster of all time next to WWE 2K14, which is why I personally prefer this game to sequels (2K17-2K20). 

Also because I do not like modern WWE anyway. 
With mods you can even bring Hulk Hogan back into the game. 

The pros in this game are: 
+Stone Cold Steve Austin Showcase 
+Exhitibion with many match types
+best legend roster ever with Legends from the Golden Era, Attitude Era, Ruthless Aggression Era and WCW
+many different versions of Wrestlers 
+several clothes available for many Wrestlers
+own clothes can be created
+many retro arenas from the Golden Era, Attitude Era, WCW and even an ECW Arena (ECW November to Remember)
+For 2015 (a Wrestlinggame) good graphics
+last game with real life photos for the wrestlers, instead of this crappy 3D-Renders since 2K17
+Create a Arena
+multiplayer on one PC is fun with friends
+more managers than in any other WWE games, even more so than in WWE 2K17-20 (including legendary managers like Bobby "The Brain" Heenan, Miss Elizabeth, Jimmy Hart, Paul Heyman, Paul Bearer, Sensational Sherri and many more ... )
+all DLC is already included
+In Universe Mode the Royal Rumble and Elimnation Chamber can be played at any Show.
+Italian Patriot Theme
+MMA Fighter Theme

neutral: 

+-WWE Universe mode is ok, there have been better game modes, but the Universe in the game Is still clearly better than at 2K17 and after. This is especially because there is not yet the totally pointless promo engine and the show intros. 

The contras are: 
-glitches 
-retro wrestlers (superstars) have the same scans as the modern variants (especially the young Undertaker looks weird...)
-MyCareer is garbage
-unfortunately, no story mode as to HCTP or SVR times where you could play a career with real superstars or legends.
-no Create a Finisher Mode and no Create a Story mode / Story Designer, who would really be fabulous with the roster from this game.
-online play and the Communtiy Creations does not work anymore (2K unfortunately shutted the servers down in 2017)
-own logos can not be included in the game because of the above reason
-also no lan-mode available
-no Special Referee Match
-no Backstage Brawls
-match rules can not be edited/changed as in the predecessors
-unfortunately, they have removed the WWE Brand Draft which was still available at WWE 2K14 back then. This was one of the best features in the universe mode from WWE 2K14

Conclusion: Despite some limitations, the best WWE (2K) PC game to date.

Deutsch/German : 
WWE 2K16 ist ganz klar das beste WWE 2K Spiel auf dem PC. Neben WWE 2K14 (welches wirklich eins der besten WWE Wrestlingspiele aller Zeiten ist) ist es auÃŸerdem das beste WWE 2K Spiel bis heute. 

NatÃ¼rlich ist es kein WWE HCTP (das beste WWE Spiel aller Zeiten), aber ich muss sagen es ist wirklich das beste WWE/Wrestlingspiel fÃ¼r den PC bis heute. 

Die Nachfolger (WWE 2K17-2K20) haben leider kaum Neuerungen sondern haben noch viel mehr Bugs und Glitches, weshalb ich schon aus diesem Grund WWE 2K16 bevorzuge. AuÃŸerdem hat dieses Spiel bis heute neben WWE 2K14 das beste (Legenden) Roster aller Zeiten, was auch ein Grund fÃ¼r mich persÃ¶nlich gesehen ist, dieses Spiel zu den Nachfolgern (2K17-2K20) zu bevorzugen, vorallem weil ich die moderne WWE eh nicht mehr mag und mit den Wrestlern von heutzutage nichts anfangen kann.
  
Mit Mods aus dem Internet kann man sogar Hulk Hogan wieder ins Spiel zurÃ¼ckholen.

Hier die Pros:
+Stone Cold Steve Austin Showcase 
+Exhitibion mit vielen Matcharten 
+bestes Legenden Roster bis heute: mit Legenden aus der Golden Era, Attitude Era, Ruthless Aggression Era und sogar von WCW
+viele Retrovarianten von Wrestlern
+mehrere Kleidung fÃ¼r Wrestler verfÃ¼gbar
+eigene Kleidung kann erstellt werden  
+viele Retroarenen aus der Golden Era, Attitude Era, WCW und sogar ein ECW PPV ist enhalten (ECW November to Remember) ist enthalten 
+Die Grafik sieht sehr gut aus fÃ¼r ein Wrestlingspiel von 2015
+eigene Arenen kÃ¶nnen erstellt werden
+bis heute das letzte WWE Spiel mit echten Fotos fÃ¼r die Wrestler, anstatt diesen lieblosen 3D-Rendern seit 2K17
+alle DLC's sind sofort enthalten
+Mehrspieler-Modus am einen PC ist wie immer klasse mit Freunden
+die meisten Managers in einem WWE-Spiel bis heute, ja sogar mehr als in WWE 2K17-20 (Unter anderem legendÃ¤re Manager wie: Bobby "The Brain" Heenan, Miss Elizabeth, Jimmy Hart, Paul Heyman, Paul Bearer, Sensational Sherri und noch viele weitere...)
+Im WWE Universe-Modus kann der Royal Rumble und Elimination Chamber in jeder Show gespielt werden
+Italian Patriot Theme
+MMA Fighter Theme


Neutral:
+-WWE Universe-Modus ist ok, gab schon bessere Spielmodis, aber der Universe gefÃ¤llt mir in dem Spiel noch eindeutig besser als bei 2K17, 2K18 usw. Das liegt vorallem daran es hier noch nicht die total sinnlose Promoengine gibt und die nicht Ã¼berspringbaren Showintros.
Universe-Mode kann man sich aber in dem Spiel mal geschaut haben.

Macht mit den Legenden und den alten Attitude Era-Shows die man in den WWE Universe-Kalender einbauen kann dennoch ziemlich Laune.


Die Contras sind: 
-viele Glitches 
-Retro Wrestler haben die selben Scans wie die modernen Varianten (besonders beim jungen Undertaker siehts komisch aus...) 
-MyCareer ist mÃ¼ll
-leider kein Storymodus wie zu HCTP oder SVR-Zeiten wo man mit richtigen Superstars oder Legenden ne Karriere spielen konnte.
-kein create a Finisher und kein Create a Story-Modus/Story Designer, der wirklich mit dem Roster aus diesem Spiel traumhaft wÃ¤re.
-Online spielen und die Communtiy Creations geht nicht mehr (2K hat leider 2017 die Server abgeschaltet)
-eigene Logos kann man wegen den oben genannten Grund deshalb auch nicht mehr ins Spiel einbinden
-Leider auch kein Lan-Modus verfÃ¼gbar
-kein Special Referee Match
-keine Backstage-Brawl
-Match-Regeln kÃ¶nnen leider nicht wie in den VorgÃ¤ngern verÃ¤ndert/editiert werden
-Leider haben sie aber den WWE-Brand Draft den es damals auch noch bei WWE 2K14 gab aus dem Universe-Mode in diesem Spiel entfernt. 
Dieser war bei dem Universe-Modus aus WWE 2K14 mit eins der besten Features.

Fazit: Trotz einiger EinschrÃ¤nkungen, eindeutig das beste WWE (2K) Spiel fÃ¼r den PC bis heute.

review_text:
- Don't get confused by the "hours played" shown, I've played this game on the iPad before. 

-- FÃ¼r die Deutsche Version bitte nach unten Scrollen, danke. 

This game is just fantastic. You can really feel how much love went into this. It is a mix up of different genres, working out together in an absolutly brilliant way. I already had bought the game on iPad and decided to aquire it again on PC. The PC-version is even better, as controls with mouse an keybord are a tad more fluent. 

The Game is turn-based and about defeating the opponent's Warlock. Each warlock can cast spells, which either work directy ("fireball") or summon creatures that fight for you. Each creature has it's own characteristics, strengh and weaknesses. There are chests with power-ups to discover, secrets, weapons to use and items to craft. The envoirment ist distructable and can be included in your strategy. You gain items to "level-up" different characteristics, that suit your gameplay best. Just awesome !

The interactive Tutorial explains the concepts very good, there is a single-player campain and online multiplayer. Multiplayer is just so much fun, unfortunatly there aren't many players, as the game is (totally unjustified if you ask me) still not very known. 

It ist so much fun to let your own creativity play in this game. For me the best game of 2015!

Update 6th of June: As you can see, the dev is really behind this and still droping updates and additional content for free. You can't do nothing wrong, buy it for 6â‚¬!!



Deutsch: 

Dieses Spiel ist einfach fantastisch, Man sieht wieviel Liebe der Entwickler da hineingesteckt hat. Es ist ein Misch-Masch zwischen verschiedenen bereits bekannten Konzepten, das einfach funktioniert und viel SpaÃŸ macht. Ich hatte mir das Spiel bereits auf dem iPad geholt, und da es mir so gut gefallen hatte, habe ich es mir nochmal erworben. Die PC-Umsetzung ist genauso, wenn nicht noch besser, da die Bedienung mit Mouse und Tastatur einfacher ist. 

Es geht im Prinzip darum, den gegnerischen Hexenmeister (Warlock) zu besiegen. Jeder Warlock kann ZaubersprÃ¼che wirken, die entweder direkt wirken ("Feuerkugel"), oder Monster heraufbeschwÃ¶ren, die fÃ¼r einen KÃ¤mpfen. Jedes Monster hat seine eigenen FÃ¤higkeiten, StÃ¤rken und SchwÃ¤chen. Es gibt Waffen zum AusrÃ¼sten und GegenstÃ¤nde zum "Craften", Geheimnisse zu entdecken. Die Umgebung ist zerstÃ¶rbar, was man nutzen kann und man kann seinen Charakter "aufleveln" wie es zu einem passt. Alles wird rundenbasiert ausgespielt. 

Das interaktive Tutorial erklÃ¤rt einem gut die Steurung und Prinzipien, eine Einzelspieler-Kampanie ist vorhanden und auch online-Mulitplayer. Multplayer macht einfach so viel SpaÃŸ, nur leider gibt es nicht so viele Gegener, da dass Spiel leider (zu unrecht meiner Meinung nach) unbekannt geblieben ist. 

Es macht sehr viel SpaÃŸ die eigene KreativitÃ¤t spielen zu lassen und dieses Spiel zu entdecken. Meiner Meinung nach das beste Spiel 2015

tags: Strategy, RPG, Indie, Turn-Based, Voxel

review_text:
English:
Can't be considered a game. Although the music is OK, it does get tedious after a while of doing the same over and over. Plus, it seems to be broken. There is always one word that can't be found and seems to appear either crooked or mispelled. I've beaten all the other games from this franchise so I hardly doubt I'm mistaken. I give it a 1/10. This sort of thing can be done online in a matter of minutes. Just input your vocabulary and generate your puzzle on a free puzzle generator. The lack of enthusiasm, inspiration, and imagination is incredible. I won't recommend these to anyone.

Le doy un 1/10. Este tipo de cosa puede ser realizado en lÃ­nea en unos minutos; sÃ³lo ingresa el vocabulario y genera un puzzle en un generador de puzzle gratuito. La falta de entusiasmo, inspiraciÃ³n e imaginaciÃ³n es increÃ­ble. No recomiendo estos juegos a nadie.

English:
It could have been a good Tower Defense ... unfortunately development abruptly stopped at version 0.9.5 !!
You were almost there, guys!
In short, a mess, bugs, frames drop with certain "towers", achievements that do not unlock ...
If I had been able to finish it, I would still have give it a positive vote, but I couldn't.
If you are looking for an excellent Tower defense in the same genre (units in the role of tower, exp, and same equipment) -> https://store.steampowered.com/app/218410/Defenders_Quest_Valley_of_the_Forgotten_DX_edition/

review_text:
Een zeer knappe futuristische racer maar soms wel frustrerend moeilijk.
Het driften is moeilijk controleerbaar en de tegenstanders zijn in mijn geval iets te moeilijk in de easy mode. Daarom zou een very easy mode wel welkom zijn.
Het word je allemaal nog extra moeilijk gemaakt omdat je bolide schade oploopt en wanneer deze schade fataal is word je ergens midden achter in het traject gezet ! Reparatieboosts hadden hier niet misstaan!
Enfin, geen hoogvlieger dus al zijn de graphics wel erg mooi en de muziek lekker opzwepend !

Toch raad ik deze racer aan omdat de meesten wel veel beter zijn dan deze zondagsrijdster (*) LOL

(*) alleen ingame hÃ© ;)

review_text:
[b]English[/b]
[h1]Meh.[/h1]
Well, this game is kinda good. But on the other hand - it is not. You could describe this game as "The Geometry Dash with poor Design". The protagonist is a stick figure which runs through an obstacle course and tries its best to get out of it alive. Sadly strange reaction times and bad hitboxes make this nearly impossible. [b]But[/b] the game works and the price is fair. So I guess you can give it a try. Or save the bucks and buy your granny a nice gift. Whatever.

[b]German/Deutsch[/b]
[h1]Naja.[/h1]
Auf der einen Seite ist dieses Spiel gut. Auf der anderen wiederum - nicht. Man kÃ¶nnte dieses Spiel als "Das Geometry Dash mit schlechtem Design" bezeichnen. Der Protagonist ist ein StrichmÃ¤nnchen, welches einen Hindernisparcours durchlÃ¤uft und dabei sein Bestes gibt diesen wieder lebend zu verlassen. Bedauerlicherweise machen seltsame Reaktionszeiten und schlechte Hitboxen dieses Vorhaben nahezu unmÃ¶glich. [b]Aber[/b] das Spiel funktioniert und der Preis ist in Ordnung. Ich denke man kann es schon mal versuchen. Oder spar Dir die MÃ¼cken und kauf Deiner Oma ein nettes Geschenk. Was auch immer.
name: Pixelord
tags: Action, Indie
review_text_clean:
English 
 Meh. 
Well, this game is kinda good. But on the other hand - it is not. You could describe this game as "The Geometry Dash with poor Design". The protagonist is a stick figure which runs through an obstacle course and tries its best to get out of it alive. Sadly strange reaction times and bad hitboxes make this nearly impossible. But the game works and the price is fair. So I guess you can give it a try. Or save the bucks and buy your granny a nice gift. Whatever.

 German/Deutsch 
 Naja. 
Auf der einen Seite ist dieses Spiel gut. Auf der anderen wiederum - nicht. Man kÃ¶nnte dieses Spiel als "Das Geometry Dash mit schlechtem Design" bezeichnen. Der Protagonist ist ein StrichmÃ¤nnchen, welches einen Hindernisparcours durchlÃ¤uft und dabei sein Bestes gibt diesen wieder lebend zu verlassen. Bedauerlicherweise machen seltsame Reaktionszeiten und schlechte Hitboxen dieses Vorhaben nahezu unmÃ¶glich. Aber das Spiel funktioniert und der Preis ist in Ordnung. Ich denke man kann es schon mal versuchen. Oder spar Dir die MÃ¼cken und kauf Deiner Oma ein nettes Geschenk. Was auch immer.

review_text:
The art here is of high quality, though gameplay wise the game's disappointingly casual and shallow. We just play with trajectory visualised on screen and throw to hit more baddies with less balls, using rebounds and scenery. Good for mobile only.

[h1] Information / Review English [/h1]

The Secret Order 5: The Buried Kingdom is a hidden object adventure developed by Sunward Games.

[h1] Gameplay / Story [/h1]

Your childhood friend got in touch with some exciting news. She may have found the key to a missing city! What was planned as a happy reunion, however, takes a dark turn when she is kidnapped by strangers. This is how your exciting adventure begins ...

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ exciting story
+ partly challenging puzzles
+ solid graphic style
+ good sound
+ beautiful wallpapers
+ Notebook
+ 3 levels of difficulty
+ Bonus adventure
+ Trading cards and achievements

[h1] Contra [/h1]

- short playing time of 2 to 3 hours

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]

The Secret Order 5: The Buried Kingdom convinces with immersive gameplay at the highest level and an exciting story. Clear purchase recommendation for fans of this genre.

review_text:
Fantastische graphics maar net niet zo fantastisch als GriP. 
De geluidseffecten lijken eerder onafgewerkt want je hoort enkel de motoren van de verschillende bolides maar voor de rest amper iets anders. De muziek is ok maar niet meer dan dat!

Qua rijgedrag sluit ik mij aan met de rest van de reviewers, het racen voelt niet echt top aan, wss ook te wijten aan het gebrek aan soundeffects, maar ook qua besturing!

Toch vind ik deze game een erg leuk tussendoortje maar het hoort absoluut niet tot de toppers!

Het afwisselen van de ondergrond en het voertuig dat zich aanpast van wielen op de grond tot zweven over over het water lijkt mij vooral leuk. En er is wel redelijk wat afwisseling tussen de racemonsters en trajecten plus ook de weer effecten zijn leuk meegenomen.

Graphics: 9,5/10
Soundeffects: 5/10
Gameplay: 7,5/10

Koop dit vooral tijdens de sales of een sale!

Het afwisselen van de ondergrond en het voertuig dat zich aanpast van wielen op de grond tot zweven over over het water lijkt mij vooral leuk. En er is wel redelijk wat afwisseling tussen de racemonsters en trajecten plus ook de weer effecten zijn leuk meegenomen.

Graphics: 9,5/10
Soundeffects: 5/10
Gameplay: 7,5/10

Koop dit vooral tijdens de sales of een sale!

review_text:
[u]This review was written in English and Russian in purpose to save your money and time.[/u]

[i]I have mixed feelings about Planet RIX-13, itâ€™s neither a great game nor a bad one. Iâ€™d like to give this game a â€œneutralâ€ rating but Steam doesnâ€™t allow me to do it.[/i]
So I decided to Â«thumb upÂ» the game because I hope the developer would polish his game.

Planet RIX-13 pretends to be so called â€œold school pixel graphic point-n-click adventureâ€

Thereâ€™re few puzzles in the game and they are rather simple so you donâ€™t need to look for the gameâ€™s walkthrough.

The plot is a typical story about solving mysteries after the crash-landing on an alien planet abandon by humans. Planet RIX-13 is an extremely simple point-and-click adventure game. 
Sadly, the game doesnâ€™t really have much to say in the end, though it lasts less than an hour. It is basically a short story in game form, being almost purely linear in nature (you have an alternative ending here).

Graphically, it's exactly as presented at the screenshots.
I donâ€™t like pixel graphics but even for me the gameâ€™s graphics is pretty nice.

Thereâ€™s no music in the game at all and the developer used only three sounds in the game.

Nevertheless somehow the game gave me a sensation of the sci-fi atmosphere while I was playing it.

[i]Summary: I guess if you're a die-hard fan of the 1990s adventures and wish we were back there again, this would completely be the game for you.[/i]
But even in this case youâ€™d better buy it on sale because itâ€™s too short.
Really it looks like a demo-version and you canâ€™t expect more than an hour of gameplay.

By the way if youâ€™re an achievement hunter Planet RIX-13 could be the next ideal game in your Steam profile.

______________________________________________________________

review_text:
Very pleasantly surprised by this unique game of its kind.
A simulator shop / computer repairer, deep, fun, enough technical (not for the uninitiated I think) and apparently well followed by his dev.
So, I say YES.

TrÃ¨s agrÃ©ablement surpris par ce jeu unique dans son genre.
Un simulateur de boutique/rÃ©parateur informatique, profond, amusant, suffisament technique (pas pour les non initiÃ©s je pense) et apparement bien suivi par son dÃ©v.
Alors, je dis OUI.

review_text:
Efsane bir sekilde bagimlilik yapan ender oyunlardan. Neymis ne degilmis diye basladiktan sonra bi bakmissiniz saatler gecmis. Bilgisayar parcalarina meraginiz varsa amcanin dayinin bilgisayarini daha onceden onardiysaniz:) bu oyun size hic yabanci gelmeyecek. Alin oynayin oynattirin 10 uzerinden 10

One of rarest games are make you addictive. While you are try to learn the game, dont look at the watch again :) If you curious to PC parts(graphic cards,memories,hard drives etc)
you will already love this game. Buy it and just olay it you will not be regretfull 10/10

review_text:
Simple and damn quick arena one-stick shooter with beautiful art, character & interface design and fitting music (8-bit styled yet not tiresome, very smooth and different). It's got high quality engineworks - no lags experienced at all! Action is all about adorable porcupines getting dramatically bald and now they fight for survival with one needle left each... you shoot it in the direction you move and the 2d pseudo-phisics here is totally allright! The point is you have to collect your shot back when it bounces off walls and falls somewhere, can't catch it mid-flight.. the most fun comes from occasionate suicides, when you kill 2 enemies with one shot, deflecting off two surfaces but weirdly the trajectory ends right in your own ars while you've been trying to evade the mole which has just popped out of the ground! It's lightning-quick, crazy random in a good sense and really feels nice, even singleplayer!

review_text:
[h1] Information / Review English[/h1]

Devil's Hunt is an action adventure developed by Layopi Games.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2462288913

[h1] Gameplay / Story [/h1]

Always wanted to be in a war between angels and demons? Then please keep going! A full-blown war between demons and angels is imminent and our world has been chosen as its battlefield.

You slip into the role of Desmond, the once cheerful son of a wealthy entrepreneur. Desmond's life was disturbed by a series of unfortunate incidents, whereupon he lost most of his humanity. Through a pact with the devil, he acquired demonic powers and became the executor of hellish plans. He is both a destroyer and a savior, whose thirst for revenge grows steadily due to his ever more corrupting human qualities. He fights bitterly with fists and claws and makes use of the abilities of his demonic, but also his human nature. Although he walks through the gate of hell again and again, in the end he will have to decide what influence he would like to have on the future of humanity. "

The exploration is limited to identifying optional paths and finding the collectibles hidden there or additional souls with which Desmond can improve his skills. The budget with this resource is very understandable, because Desmond receives a soul for each defeated opponent - plus all those who are hidden in the game world or are hiding in Lucifer's mirrors. While the souls initially seem like a scarce commodity, at the end of the game they are almost in abundance, as Devilâ€™s Hunt then focuses on more fights with more instead of fewer opponents. Therefore, in the last hour of the game, you can still acquire all the skills that can be unlocked with souls. But you don't really need them.

[h1] Combat system [/h1]

Overall, the gameplay of Devilâ€™s Hunt is a balanced mix of exploring the levels, very shallow switch puzzles where there is no wrong and everything relevant is marked, and action-packed battles. These leave a good figure, because the opponents as well as your own fighting styles and skills are sufficiently diverse. A seamless change between the fighting styles is possible and the fights are a bit challenging here and there, but the depth is still missing: The only challenge is actually always evading at the right moment. The various boss fights don't add any new nuances here either. Here, too, you just have to dodge and the rest is no longer a problem.

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ a gripping, novel-based, dark story
+ fast combat system
+ Character development with many skills
+ high quality cut scenes
+ Change the form to human / demon
+ many setting options
+ Achievements and Trading cards

[h1] Contra [/h1]

- Imprecise application of skills
- Technical problems, stability and graphics errors
- few enemy types

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]

Devil's Hunt offers you an Action- Adventure that revives the Battle between Light and Dark. So I enjoy the game and that's the most important thing. But I would only buy the game in a sale.

[h1] Gameplay/ Geschichte [/h1]

Du wolltest schon immer bei einem Krieg zwischen Engeln und DÃ¤monen stehen? Dann lieÃŸ bitte weiter! Ein ausgewachsener Krieg zwischen DÃ¤monen und Engeln steht nÃ¤mlich kurz bevor und unsere Welt wurde zu dessen Schlachtfeld auserkoren. 

Du schlÃ¼pfst in die Rolle von Desmond, dem einst lebensfrohen Sohn eines reichen Unternehmers. Desmonds Leben geriet durch eine Reihe unglÃ¼cklicher VorfÃ¤lle in Schieflage, woraufhin er den GroÃŸteil seiner Menschlichkeit einbÃ¼ÃŸte. Durch einen Pakt mit dem Teufel erlangte er DÃ¤monenkrÃ¤fte und wurde zum Vollstrecker hÃ¶llischer PlÃ¤ne. Er ist gleichermaÃŸen ein ZerstÃ¶rer und Retter, dessen Rachehunger aufgrund seiner immer weiter verderbenden menschlichen Eigenschaften stetig anwÃ¤chst. Erbittert kÃ¤mpft er mit FÃ¤usten und Klauen und bedient sich dabei der FÃ¤higkeiten seines dÃ¤monischen, aber auch seines menschlichen Wesens. Obwohl er das Tor der HÃ¶lle immer wieder durchschreitet, wird er sich am Ende entscheiden mÃ¼ssen, welchen Einfluss er auf die Zukunft der Menschheit haben mÃ¶chte."

Die Erkundung beschrÃ¤nkt sich darauf, optionale Wege zu erkennen und das dort versteckte Sammelobjekt oder zusÃ¤tzliche Seelen zu finden, mit denen Desmond seine Fertigkeiten ausbauen kann. Der Haushalt mit dieser Ressource ist einmal sehr nachvollziehbar, denn pro besiegtem Gegner erhÃ¤lt Desmond eine Seele â€“ dazu kommen all jene, die in der Spielwelt versteckt sind oder sich in Luzifers Spiegeln verstecken. WÃ¤hrend die Seelen zunÃ¤chst wie ein knappes Gut wirken, erhÃ¤lt man sie zum Ende des Spieles beinahe im Ãœberfluss, da Devilâ€™s Hunt dann auf mehr KÃ¤mpfe mit mehr statt weniger Widersachern setzt. Daher kann man in der letzten Spielstunde dann doch noch alle Fertigkeiten erwerben, die sich mit Seelen freischalten lassen. Wirklich benÃ¶tigen tut man sie aber nicht.

[h1] Kampfsystem [/h1]

Insgesamt ist das Gameplay von Devilâ€™s Hunt eine ausgewogene Mischung aus Erkundung der Level, ganz seichten SchalterrÃ¤tseleinlagen, bei denen es kein Falsch gibt und alles Relevante markiert ist, sowie actiongeladenen KÃ¤mpfen. Diese hinterlassen eine gute Figur, denn die Gegner wie auch die eigenen Kampfstile und Fertigkeiten sind ausreichend vielfÃ¤ltig. Ein nahtloser Wechsel zwischen den Kampfstilen ist mÃ¶glich und die KÃ¤mpfe sind hier und da auch ein wenig herausfordernd, wobei die Tiefe dennoch fehlt: Die einzige Herausforderung besteht eigentlich immer nur im Ausweichen im richtigen Moment. Hier bringen auch die verschiedenen BosskÃ¤mpfe keine neuen Nuancen ein. Auch hier muss man immer nur ausweichen und der Rest ist kein Problem mehr.

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ eine packende, auf einem Roman basierende,dÃ¼stere Geschichte
+ flottes Kampfsystem
+ Charakterentwicklung mit vielen FÃ¤higkeiten
+ hochwertige Cutscenes
+ Wechsel die Form zu Mensch/DÃ¤mon
+ viele EinstellungsmÃ¶glichkeiten
+ Errungenschaften und Sammelkarten

[h1] Kontra [/h1]

- UnprÃ¤zises Anwenden der Fertigkeiten
- Technikprobleme, StabilitÃ¤t und Grafikfehler
- wenig Gegnertypen

[h1] Fazit [/h1]

Devil's Hunt bietet dir ein Action-Abenteuer, welches den Kampf zwischen Licht und Dunkelheit erneut aufleben lÃ¤sst. Also mir bereitet das Spiel SpaÃŸ und das ist ja das wichtigste. Ich wÃ¼rde das Spiel aber nur in einem Sale kaufen.

Who is lying next to me?

In the summer, my parents and I went to a village. It's located not far from Yoshkar-Ola. Well, of course, since it's summer, that means discos and hanging out until morning. This story happened on the third day after arriving at the country house.

After the disco, my sister and I were walking home. And on the way, we had a pretty serious argument. She turned around and went to a friend's place, well, and I continued on my way home. I arrived, went into the small house (we have two of them â€” one big one, where people live permanently, and another small one, which is only opened in the summer). My sister and I were settled in this small house, meaning we were the only ones in it.

I got undressed, lay down on the bed, and was just lying there thinking my own thoughts. Suddenly, footsteps sounded in the hallway â€” heavy ones, like that. I thought it was my sister coming back. I turned towards the wall and kept lying there. The door opened, someone came in and lay down on the bed with me. I'm lying there, not turning around â€” I was so mad at my sister. And then suddenly, a voice comes from under the window: "Svetlana (that's me), open the door for me, it's your sister â€” sorry if I offended you!"

That's when my hair stood on end. I'm lying there, unable to move, and thinking: "Who is lying with me?" I start to slowly turn around and see two yellow eyes and a vague dark figure. As soon as I saw it, I jumped up and ran out of the house like a bat out of hell. My sister says: "What's wrong with you? Your face looks so..." I told her everything immediately. She didn't believe me at first, but then she remembered the look on my face again and fell silent...
name: Lucius
tags: Horror, Adventure, Villain Protagonist, Gore, Nudity

___
Who is lying next to me?

In the summer, my parents and I went to a village. It's located not far from Yoshkar-Ola. Well, of course, since it's summer, that means discos and hanging out until morning. This story happened on the third day after arriving at the country house.

After the disco, my sister and I were walking home. And on the way, we had a pretty serious argument. She turned around and went to a friend's place, well, and I continued on my way home. I arrived, went into the small house (we have two of them â€” one big one, where people live permanently, and another small one, which is only opened in the summer). My sister and I were settled in this small house, meaning we were the only ones in it.

I got undressed, lay down on the bed, and was just lying there thinking my own thoughts. Suddenly, footsteps sounded in the hallway â€” heavy ones, like that. I thought it was my sister coming back. I turned towards the wall and kept lying there. The door opened, someone came in and lay down on the bed with me. I'm lying there, not turning around â€” I was so mad at my sister. And then suddenly, a voice comes from under the window: "Svetlana (that's me), open the door for me, it's your sister â€” sorry if I offended you!"

That's when my hair stood on end. I'm lying there, unable to move, and thinking: "Who is lying with me?" I start to slowly turn around and see two yellow eyes and a vague dark figure. As soon as I saw it, I jumped up and ran out of the house like a bat out of hell. My sister says: "What's wrong with you? Your face looks so." I told her everything immediately. She didn't believe me at first, but then she remembered the look on my face again and fell silent.

review_text: Fun game with some jank, but in a good way.
name: Lucius
tags: Horror, Adventure, Villain Protagonist, Gore, Nudity
review_text_clean: Fun game with some jank, but in a good way.

review_text:
If you remember this game from watching YouTubers playing it when you were younger and thought it looked fun, please understand that it was because those YouTubers tried really hard to make it look that way for you. Keep those good memories, and stay away from playing this game yourself.

This game is just a mess. Itâ€™s basically unplayable without a guide. Thereâ€™s only one way to complete each mission. Yes, just one freakin' way!!! So, say goodbye to any creativity you think youâ€™ll get to use. In this game, your only job is to figure out what that one fixed solution is and how many steps it takes to reach that goal. Sounds simple, right? BUT ....

The hints are useless, the controls are clunky, and itâ€™s full of bugs. Objects are crazy hard to see or interact with, and after the mid-game, youâ€™re completely lost with no idea of what to do, where to go, or how to progress. So, just stay away from this game for the sake of your past enjoyment with those YouTubers.

Edited: The only good thing about this game is that the achievements are easy to get. That's it. However, the concept is actually great and totally deserves a proper remake. But this version? Itâ€™s just garbage.
-----------------------------

So, say goodbye to any creativity you think youâ€™ll get to use. In this game, your only job is to figure out what that one fixed solution is and how many steps it takes to reach that goal. The hints are useless, the controls are clunky, and itâ€™s full of bugs. Objects are crazy hard to see or interact with, and after the mid-game, youâ€™re completely lost with no idea of what to do, where to go, or how to progress. So, just stay away from this game for the sake of your past enjoyment with those YouTubers.

Edited: The only good thing about this game is that the achievements are easy to get. That's it. However, the concept is actually great and totally deserves a proper remake. But this version? Itâ€™s just garbage.
---

review_text:
Begonnen hat alles mit der Such nach Geld. Ich hab jedes noch so kleines Item gestohlen, jede Pflanze aufgesammelt und zum heilen des Ã¶fteren die WasserfÃ¤sser aufgesucht. Dann kam die Erleuchtung. Es gibt Ã¼bers ganze Spiel verteilt einige NPCs, die aus dem Nichts Besen beschwÃ¶ren kÃ¶nnen. Daraus folgt ein unendlicher Supply an Besen und damit unendlich Geld. Eine von zwei Ressourcen maximiert. Die Jagd nach mehr und mehr EP habe ich zwar angefangen aber schnell aufgegeben und mich mit meinem potentiell unendlichen Reichtum zufrieden gegeben(All dies ist Jahre her und ist noch auf einer CD-Version getestet).
Trotzdem hat mich neulich noch einmal der Ehrgeiz gepackt, ich hab mir diese Version zugelegt und  hab mich Stunden hingesetzt um jede einzelne Quest zu dokumentieren(anfangs auf Papier) und zu analysieren, was der ideale Weg und damit das Maximale Level(EP) ist. Welche Quest in der Hafenstadt lÃ¶st man fÃ¼r welches lager, welche Faction-Questline gibt die meiste EP und welche Quests kann man im Banditenlager auch als Ordenskrieger/Magier oder in der Vulkanfestung als Bandit erledigen. Und dann die enttÃ¤uschende Wahrheit: TatsÃ¤chlich gibt es in diesem Spiel eine MÃ¶glichkeit, unendlich Exp ohne Glitches und Bugs zu farmen, wenn man wie ich Ã¼ber eine gewisse Menge an Geld verfÃ¼gt. So kann man an(falls man eine Pfanne besitzt) an allen Feuerstellen beim Konsum EP gebende Steaks vom Hai zubereiten. Die dafÃ¼r benÃ¶tigten rohen Haie kÃ¶nnen bei Nico oder Salty mithilfe der oben genannten Geldfarm Methode unendlich erworben werden. Und ich denke, damit kann ich nun offiziell von Risen 1 behaupten, ich habe es zu mindestens 100% durchgespielt und werde es nur noch rausholen, um eine komplett normalen, aber sehr nostalgischen Run abzuschlieÃŸen.
NatÃ¼rlich muss ich noch erwÃ¤hnen, dass dieses Spiel auf jeder Ebene absolutes Meisterwerk ist und ich es jedem nur empfehlen kann.

review_text:
Ambientacion - Suspenso - Terror
Este juego lo tiene en la medida adecuada. Por momento me hizo acordar a SOMA, pero todo cambia cuando agarras un arma y como se agradece tener algo de defensa personal. Aun asi no nos garantiza que vamos a poder matar todo lo que se venga, y es por eso que Syndrome te mantiene atrapado, recorriendo la nave y tratando de averiguar que pasÃ³...
Graficos excelentes, jugabilidad aprobada, sonido increiblemente atrapante y algunos bugs menores que no opacan el resultado.

Esperemos que el final este a la altura de lo que propone 8/10
name: Syndrome
tags: Horror, FPS, Survival Horror, Shooter, Stealth

Um verdadeiro jogo Ã  tuga (e que me fez decidir deixar de ir para Lisboa ou Porto no Inter-Cidades) e que recomendo jogarem (nem que seja sÃ³ para se rirem)!

ENG: A great f****** sequel!!
Just like the 1st game, it has more sillyness, a few more cooky side-quests and this time also features a beautiful pixelized bottle of Licor BeirÃ£o!!! A real true Tuga style game (that made me decide to never take the Inter-Cidades Porto-Lisbon ever again) that I recommend playing (even if just for a laugh)!

A quick note to people playing this game in english, though: If you play (and understand) in Portuguese, the game becomes 200% funnier

Allerdings kÃ¶nnte einem der SpaÃŸ etwas geraubt werden wenn man sieht dass es Cue's gibt die besser sind als Andere. Doch ich persÃ¶nlich sehe auch hier kein Problem, denn wenn man halbwegs mit Verstand spielt kann man recht schnell einen netten kleinen Cue holen.

Gekauft werden diese Cues von der IngamewÃ¤hrung, welche ihr durch Quests, Free Crates (jeden Tag eine) oder durchs gewinnen im Quick Play + Tournament erhalten kÃ¶nnt. Dieses Spiel bietet also sehr wohl und recht gut die MÃ¶glichkeit es ohne Kostenaufwand gut zu spielen.

Denke dass ich selbst ein gutes Beispiel dafÃ¼r bin, da ich bisher 320.000 Coins erspielt habe und der "beste und teuerste Cue" gerade mal 60.000 kostet. Von daher sollte es jedem klar sein, dass man in diesem Spiel kein Geld investieren muss um gut zu sein.

Die Steuerung ist recht simpel, mit der Maus wird durch Linksklick halten gesteuert und durch Rechtsklick zurÃ¼ckziehen gestoÃŸen. Diese Steuerung ist wirklich recht angenehm wobei ich in Zukunft auf eine Nutzung der Tasten A+D fÃ¼r ein noch genaueres Aiming hoffe.

Ein Knackpunkt hat dieses Spiel allerdings, die Schwarze (8) muss nicht in das gegenÃ¼ber liegende Loch gestoÃŸen werden, wie die letzte Kugel. dies macht viele AbschlÃ¼sse leider recht einfach, ansonsten alles in Allem ein traumhaft angenehmes Spiel und vorallem fÃ¼r 1,50-2.00 kann man sich hier wohl nicht sehr beschweren.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

ENGLISH (Google Translator)

So now more than 30 hours of INGAME time, I re-examine my review and speak openly all the advantages and disadvantages. Let's start with my personal impression.

I have hoped for a simple  billiards game, on STEAM. Here it is really only about going to play, things to release and end. To give u differnt game names there would be Poolnation which tries to point with graphic, which in my opinion is simply not necessary for a nice small pool game, and the 8 Ball Pool Flash Game, which is mobile phone based and therefore billions of quests, features And other things.

These are for me negative points in the other games and are here very well omitted. Here you simply play a few games and have fun playing billiards. However, one of the fun might be stolen if you see that there are cue's better than others. But I personally see also no problem, because if you half-minded plays you can quickly get a nice little cue.

These cues are purchased from the Ingame currency, which you can get through Quests, Free Crates (every day one) or by winning in the Quick Play + Tournament. This game offers very well and quite well the possibility to play well without cost.

Think that I am a good example, since I have so far get 320,000 coins and the "best and most expensive cue" costs just 60,000. Therefore, it should be clear to everyone that you do not have to invest money in this game to be good.

The control is fairly straightforward, with the mouse is controlled by left-clicking hold and pushed back by right-clicking. This control is really quite enjoyable, which I hope in the future to use the keys A + D for an even more accurate aiming.

A cracking point has this game, however, the black (8) does not have to be pushed into the opposite hole, like the last ball. This makes many qualifications unfortunately quite simple, apart from that all in all a fantastically pleasant game and especially for 1.50-2.00 you can not complain.

Menonton ulang Squid Game musim pertama, rasanya lebih menyesakkan dari sebelumnya. Karena udah tau bagaimana akhirnyaâ€¦

Mungkin memang begitulah hikmahnya, mengetahui akhir cerita justru bisa lebih menyakitkan daripada menjalaninya dalam ketidaktahuan. Mungkin itu sebabnya takdir dirahasiakan. Agar kita tetap bangun setiap pagi dengan harapan baru, mimpi baru, dan keyakinan bahwa segalanya masih mungkin berubah. 

Meski.. bisa jadi akhirnya tidak seperti yang kita inginkan.

Wenn man dieses Spiel spielen mÃ¶chte ist man hÃ¶chstwahrscheinlich auf einen Nostalgie- Tripp aus.

Das geht, dazu muss man aber eigentlich die Deutsche Ãœbersetzung reinmodden ( https://www.compiware-forum.de/forum/thread/39095-drakensang-am-fluss-der-zeit-german-patch/ ).

Ohne die gibts nÃ¤mlich keinen NPC-Dialog auÃŸerhalb von Storyrelevanten GeschprÃ¤chen, aka die AtmosphÃ¤re geht flÃ¶ten. Ansonsten sollte man sich ans regelmÃ¤ÃŸige Schnellspeichern gewÃ¶hnen.

Lo menos relevante es que tenga poca mÃºsica o pocos sonidos en general, pero no es demasiado importante tampoco.

El movimiento de la cÃ¡mara es minÃºsculo y no te acompaÃ±a del todo bien, y entiendo que eso te fuerza a ir mÃ¡s lento y a lo seguro, pero no estar en control de lo que podÃ©s ver es muy frustrante, a pesar de tener toda la pinta de estar hecho asÃ­ a propÃ³sito.

Concepto interesante, el juego da un poco de miedo, especialmente la parte de la araÃ±a, porque estÃ¡ bien ambientada y los enemigos se camuflan perfectamente.
Se maneja bien, se ve lindo (excepto las medusas con propulsiÃ³n) y en general, lo que puse al principio, es divertido. Estresa un poco, sobre todo si alguna de las araÃ±as de mierda te salta desde un Ã¡ngulo re de mierda cuando no ves nada y es muy acelerado todo como para poder reaccionar.

El juego realmente no te premia por ir despacio y matar todos los bichos, pero sÃ­ que te castiga por tratar de rushear y pasando todo de largo.

No sÃ©, la versiÃ³n difÃ­cil me parece que sobra, el juego estÃ¡ bien como estÃ¡ hasta ese punto por la mayor parte asÃ­ que se lleva una nota positiva, pero hasta ahÃ­.

6,5/10

review_text:
Lindo juego de puzzles con elementos y rotacion 3d, no son complicados pero sirve para distraerse o quemar el tiempo. 
Los graficos son buenos y la musica es relajante (quizas demasiado?).
Me hubiera gustado que tuviera la opcion de zoom in/ zoom out, ya que en algunos niveles el color de las piezas seleccionadas no se distingue claramente de las otras y puede ser un poquito frustrante.
name: Knot
tags: Puzzle, Physics, 3D, Relaxing, Casual
review_text_clean:
Lindo juego de puzzles con elementos y rotacion 3d, no son complicados pero sirve para distraerse o quemar el tiempo. 
Los graficos son buenos y la musica es relajante (quizas demasiado?).
Me hubiera gustado que tuviera la opcion de zoom in/ zoom out, ya que en algunos niveles el color de las piezas seleccionadas no se distingue claramente de las otras y puede ser un poquito frustrante.

review US FR on the Oculus Rift
( je ne sais pas pourquoi Ã§a marque que j'ai jouÃ© 9 minutes car lÃ  Ã§a fait quelques heures que je joue )

oh my god the best hoverboard vr game possible , it is impossible to create best control for an hoverboard and the immersion is incredible
the  game is a wonder please never change the control it is the perfection 

we can choose to have a body or not in the options personally i love the body option

and the levels change everytimes , the place of the enemy , the number and more are random generated 
so a same llevel mission never seems to be the same 

the hoverboard is wonderfull and the attacks amazing , 

and the sword is awesome
 just one thing it would be great if we could choose the hand with the sword and the hand with the gun controler for the hoverboard
thank you so much to have bring us a so incredible experience vr and game 

please say me Developpers you will prepare dlc for the game with more stages and hoverbards for exemple skate hoverboard as adding
 it is all we could wish but only as adding to can control multiple hoverboard because the hoverboard you created is wonderfull

review_text:
[b]Nederlandse versie hier beneden.[/b]

You get an example figure. With four or five black figures you have to rebuilt it. Just remember that black on black gives white. And keep in mind to count the dots on your background to figure out how big your example is. So... how hard could it be? Well, you will soon notice [b][i]VOI[/i][/b] is a real brain teaser.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2943144821

In [b][i]VOI[/i][/b] you get 66 examples to rebuild. Each 11 gives an achievement. When you close the game and restart it, it will open on your last number. 
Music and sound effects can be put on and off. And in case you like this, there are trading cards.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2942708895

I had to restart the game once or twice, because shapes were disappearing. Other than that it is a great game for a small price. 
Recommanded!
Rating: 9/10.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2942708926

[b]Nederlandse versie.[/b]

Je krijgt een voorbeeldfiguur. Met vier of vijf zwarte figuren moet je het nabouwen. Vergeet niet dat zwart op zwart wit geeft. En vergeet niet om de stippen op je achtergrond te tellen om erachter te komen hoe groot je voorbeeld is. Dus... hoe moeilijk kan het zijn? Nou, je zult snel merken dat [b][i]VOI[/i][/b] een echte hersenkraker is.

In [b][i]VOI[/i][/b] krijg je 66 voorbeelden om na te maken. Elke 11 geeft een prestatie. Wanneer je het spel sluit en opnieuw start, wordt het geopend op het nummer waar je was gebleven.
Muziek en geluidseffecten kunnen aan en uit worden gezet. En voor het geval je dit leuk vindt, er zijn 5 ruilkaarten, waarvan je er 3 krijgt door [b][i]VOI[/i][/b] te spelen.

Ik moest het spel een of twee keer opnieuw opstarten, omdat er vormen verdwenen. Verder is het een prima game voor een kleine prijs. 
Aanbevolen!
Beoordeling: 9/10.
name: VOI
tags: Casual, Indie, Puzzle, Simulation, Singleplayer

review_text:
[b]WOW!  This game is a real gem! / Ce jeu est un vrai bijou! (description franÃ§aise plus bas) [/b]

Basically, this game provides you with some shapes and a template.  All you have to do is to reproduce the design you see, which is a bit more complicated than it sounds...  Why?  Because all your shapes are black, and when overlapping the shapes, the parts of the shapes that superpose will turn white while the rest stays black.  The rules are simple: (i) only one solution is possible, (ii) all shapes have to be used for the solution to be completed (meaning you cannot discard or use less shapes than provided by the game).  Challenging and entertaining at the same time!  For the asking price, you cannot go wrong.

En gros, ce jeu vous fournit quelques formes et un modÃ¨le.  Tout ce que vous avez Ã  faire est de reproduire le dessin que vous voyez, ce qui est un peu plus compliquÃ© qu'il n'y paraÃ®t...  Pourquoi ?  Parce que toutes vos formes sont noires, et que lorsque vous superposez les formes, les parties des formes qui se superposent deviennent blanches tandis que le reste lui est noir.  Les rÃ¨gles sont simples : (i) une seule solution est possible, (ii) toutes les formes doivent Ãªtre utilisÃ©es pour que la solution soit complÃ¨te (ce qui signifie que vous ne pouvez pas vous dÃ©faire de certaines formes ou utiliser moins de formes que celles fournies par le jeu).  Un dÃ©fi et un divertissement tout Ã  la fois!  Pour le prix demandÃ©, vous faites une bonne affaire.

Psikodelya is an intriguing and amazingly imersive game with an equaly amazing and intriguing art style.

review_text:
review english and fr 
i recommand a lot the game  lets speak of the game with more details 

first  we can use free locomotion , the game begin by a tutorial full of enemies in order to training us to use weapons ,  the gun and weapon are not simple weapon with a button to touch to reload , you have to do the different  moves like for reload a weapon in the reality
in this tutorial we learn too to climb and the impression of height is really incredible 
after this first great experience lets talk of the main mission 

we have from the first second the impression to be in a cop movie 
you meet beautifull womens with few interactions and possibilties ,from simply talk to her and more if affinity for an itimate moment 
 
lets talk now of your first hostage mission 
the goal is to save a woman we can hear call help from a lot of bad bandits  , the place is bigger , the enemies has an IA really amazing and sometimes it can be really a challenge to survive but our freedom is great

review_text:
Sangat recommended buat kalian yang suka dengan Warrior Series dari Koei Temco. Selain itu, juga sangat cocok buat kalian yang suka game brutal dan barbar. Game ini adalah game Samurai Warriors singel player dengan cerita yang berfokus pada Klan Sanada. Bakal diceritain perjuangan klan yang identik dengan kostum warna merah ini dari zaman Takeda hingga Sanada Yukimura.

Poin Plus untuk Sanada Yukimura dan Sanada Noboyuki versi anak-anak dan Lady Muramatsu yang cakep banget!

review_text:
Uma experiÃªncia Ãºnica na Ã¡rea de games. Um jogo com um enredo fantÃ¡stico, fotografia linda e que prende desde o inÃ­cio.
Como violinista, achei a adiÃ§Ã£o do violino uma excelente ideia, e um conceito Ãºnico de usar a mÃºsica e um instrumento musical para modificar o ambiente. Inclusive foi o violino que me levou a conhecer o jogo.
Mesmo com computador mais antigo, o jogo rodou bem, e, quando tive um problema devido Ã  idade do computador, na mesma hora fui atendido pelo desenvolvedor do jogo que altamente se prontificou a resolver o problema e resolveu. 

Recomendo. Mesmo. Um jogo de uma produtora brasileira que mostra o potencial de uma equipe fabulosa. Uma ideia original com um enredo fabuloso.

Men cry too.
The game has stunning artwork â€” like a living comic book. The story surprises you with its variability: you're not just playing through a plot, you're shaping it with your choices. Gradually, you start to understand the world around you and the people beside you, and you realize that in a zombie apocalypse you might have to rely on people just like them â€” unfamiliar, complicated, but real.
At first, it seems like the story will simply unfold on its own. But once you start thinking deeper, you understand: every decision you make could cost someone their life. The stakes rise fast.
The game offers interesting and sometimes unexpected ways to solve problems. It shows the world through the eyes of survivors â€” not heroic soldiers mowing down hordes of zombies, but ordinary people trapped in a world with no future. People who struggle not only with monsters, but also with simple, everyday challenges we never even think about in real life.
This is a story about how people behave at the edge of the world â€” without gloss, filters, or embellishment. Itâ€™s about friendship, betrayal, and difficult choices you canâ€™t avoid. And it reminds you how important it is to have something to fight for, something to get up for every morning, something that keeps you from giving up.
Itâ€™s even a bit funny that by the end the main characters run out of ammo â€” a small detail, but perfectly fitting for a story thatâ€™s so genuine and grounded.
This is a story about ordinary people, just like us. People who doubt, who make mistakes, who choose â€” sometimes painfully, sometimes blindly. There are no right decisions here; there is only your path. A path that makes the game so powerful and touching. Because you never know whatâ€™s waiting for you around the next corner.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

review_text:
El remake de uno de los Final Fantasy de NES.
AquÃ­ se empiezan a ver algunas de las caracterÃ­sticas que hicieron grande a esta saga: mapa grande, en el que te dan cierta libertad para explorar; muchos secretos completamente opcionales; un muy buen sistema de combate, variado (es bueno hasta hoy en dÃ­a, en su Ã©poca tenÃ­a que ser brutal).
Se han aÃ±adido algunas caracterÃ­sticas para mejorar la experiencia (acelerar y automatizar los combates da la vida), pero no son suficientes para pulir algunos aspectos del original. La mazmorra final era infame hasta para su Ã©poca. El ratio de combates aleatorios es muy irregular, con tramos en los que no combates nada y al siguiente instante peleando cada dos pasos.
La dificultad estÃ¡ muy bien balanceada. El juego es retante, dÃ­ficil incluso, pero no frustante, excepto en la parte de Garuda y la mazmorra final (la cual no es dificil, es que tiene partes injustas).
Si te gustan los JRPGs clÃ¡sicos, no te importa tener una historia escasa y ciertos errores de diseÃ±o, y tener un muy buen combate, es una magnÃ­fica opciÃ³n. Aunque si reunes esas caracterÃ­sticas, probablemente ya hayas jugado a este juego en la DS en su momento.

tags: RPG, JRPG, Turn-Based, Remake, Classic

review_text:
EstÃ¡ bien si tienes en cuenta que es un juego de los 90'
Por la parte de rol el mundo y lo que sucede en Ã©l es interesante, pero la historia estÃ¡ contada de manera bastante escueta y a veces hay elementos que se incorporan de la nada
El sistema de combate y trabajos es sencillo, entretenido incluso, pero al cabo de las horas echo en falta algo de profundidad y cohesiÃ³n entre los trabajos

Por Ãºltimo aÃ±adir que hay ciertos criterios para misiones que no estÃ¡n demasiado claros para mi gusto, en mi caso no he conseguido desbloquear el Ãºltimo jefe opcional, he buscado guÃ­as y completado requisitos si Ã©xito, creo que si se juega serÃ­a muy recomendable hacerlo con guÃ­a desde el principio para evitar esto
